title: Drawing, "Studies of Trees and Rocks, Road to Mocho near Chimborazo, Ecuador", June 16, 1857
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at upper right:  Whitish green leaves small; again, at lower left: rich moss/ greys  whites; again, at center right: road; again, at lower center: rich mosses airplants on trees / Road to Mocho near Chimborazo / June 16 57; and at bottom left:  S. America
description: Horizontal sheet containing details of trees and rock on a road

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Studies of Trees and Rocks, Road to Mocho near Chimborazo, Ecuador", June 16, 1857.
June 16, 1857. Graphite on buff paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-234.
